com.squareup.moshi

Interface JsonAdapter.Factory

  • Enclosing class:
    JsonAdapter<T>

    public static interface JsonAdapter.Factory

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JsonAdapter<?> create(Type type, Set<? extends Annotation> annotations, Moshi moshi)
      Attempts to create an adapter for type annotated with annotations.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        @CheckReturnValue
 @Nullable
JsonAdapter<?> create(Type type,
                                                   Set<? extends Annotation> annotations,
                                                   Moshi moshi)
        Attempts to create an adapter for type annotated with annotations. This returns the adapter if one was created, or null if this factory isn't capable of creating such an adapter.

        Implementations may use Moshi.adapter(java.lang.reflect.Type) to compose adapters of other types, or Moshi.nextAdapter(com.squareup.moshi.JsonAdapter.Factory, java.lang.reflect.Type, java.util.Set<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>) to delegate to the underlying adapter of the same type.
